title: To Karthus players : How do you pronounce Lich?
body:
Up til recently, I'd always thought Lich rhymed with Rich, so Lich Bane = L-itch Bane

But when I played Divinity Original Sin, they pronounced Lich as Like, which blew my mind.

Which is it?  pls.

replies.body:
So was Divinity Original Sin lying then?

Those effers!

Don't trust video games all the time.

Go play the second Final Fantasy: Dissidia game, and listen to them pronounce "Tidus."

Lich with the ch as in "cheese". 

Middle and old English has pronounced it as "Lik" before.
